name: Caroline
result: Can you see the tail? The comet is on a trajectory â€“ and so are we. We need to avoid hitting both the comet and one of the tails, while we can go through the other.

name: Raymonde
result: I know you want to retrieve that frame, but it's too dangerous to leave the spaceship because of the radiation. We must use the space drone. To do this, use a secret code.

name: Hypatia
result: It looks almost like a wire that is untwisting itself. Let me help you fetch it. Perhaps you can solve an equation for me.

name: Mary
result: I am ecstatic to help you, my dear. You need to figure out if there is going to be a geomagnetic storm on the day of the spacewalk. Ensure you check the day of your planned walk.
